- ~Mathlib.RingTheory.Perfection                    instructions    15.7%
```
Your original commit looks like the right one to me (though the instance should be called `toNonUnitalSubringClass`)

For the file `Discriminant.lean`, it seems that adding the line
```
 have : CharZero K := SubsemiringClass.instCharZero K
```
before lines 340, 383 and 422 helps with the following line
```
haveI : NumberField K := @NumberField.mk _ _ inferInstance hK₀
```
Also, the `simp` on lines 363 and 407 are slow and in both cases the line
```
      convert hx₁ <;> simp
```
can be replaced with 
```
      convert hx₁
      · simp only [IntermediateField.lift_top]
      · simp only [IntermediateField.lift_adjoin, Set.image_singleton]
```
for a significative improvement.

There were [significant changes](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/compare/d5b05de2-44e7-4d90-a935-e2f263031f33/to/a301f9cb-3601-4d7d-a8fd-6fa8d632af6e) against commit 87c93626b51f79de48f5fdca516f3a0b2deb9cfd:

There were [significant changes](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/compare/d5b05de2-44e7-4d90-a935-e2f263031f33/to/2fb286c2-4633-47df-b03c-55493c364b4f) against commit 87c93626b51f79de48f5fdca516f3a0b2deb9cfd:

!bench

Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/a1975e8c-4e74-4abf-996d-cbaba8ac25cb) for commit 552df3dbe114a1fc130abf8923c927b3049dc56e.
There were [significant changes](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/compare/d5b05de2-44e7-4d90-a935-e2f263031f33/to/a1975e8c-4e74-4abf-996d-cbaba8ac25cb) against commit 87c93626b51f79de48f5fdca516f3a0b2deb9cfd:
```diff
  Benchmark                                         Metric         Change
  =======================================================================
- ~Mathlib.Algebra.Algebra.Subalgebra.Rank          instructions    16.0%
- ~Mathlib.NumberTheory.Cyclotomic.PrimitiveRoots   instructions    14.6%
- ~Mathlib.NumberTheory.NumberField.Discriminant    instructions    13.3%
- ~Mathlib.RingTheory.Perfection                    instructions    15.7%
```
Your original commit looks like the right one to me (though the instance should be called `toNonUnitalSubringClass`)

For the file `Discriminant.lean`, it seems that adding the line
```
 have : CharZero K := SubsemiringClass.instCharZero K
```
before lines 340, 383 and 422 helps with the following line
```
haveI : NumberField K := @NumberField.mk _ _ inferInstance hK₀
```
Also, the `simp` on lines 363 and 407 are slow and in both cases the line
```
      convert hx₁ <;> simp
```
can be replaced with 
```
      convert hx₁
      · simp only [IntermediateField.lift_top]
      · simp only [IntermediateField.lift_adjoin, Set.image_singleton]
```
for a significative improvement.
